original_title: 神木隆之介20歳の旅 ベトナム国境鉄道を行く〜世界一美しい絶景棚田を求めて〜
overview: Actor Kamiki Ryunosuke (21) takes an 6 day travel for the length of 450 kilometers by train in Vietnam.  Renowned as a railway fan, Kamiki will have chance to travel by various types of trains from the normal ones to night sleep ones to see the charm of foreign countries.
title: Kamiki Ryunosuke – 20 Year Old Travel Vietnam Railroad
